caption.p: Impact of Tragia involucrata L. leaves extracts on onset and duration of sleep. (A) Onset of sleep, (B) Duration of sleep. Data are shown as mean ± SEM. ∗ denotes p < 0.05 vs control, ∗∗ denotes p < 0.01 vs control, ∗∗∗ denotes p < 0.001 vs control (One Way ANOVA followed by Dunnett t-test).
